info.name: Menta Backend - Admin API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Admin role endpoints

request.description: Send OTP to email for authentication. Works for both new and existing accounts.
Verify OTP and get session_id. Returns account info and session for authentication.
Sign out and invalidate current session.
Get all accounts with optional filters. Supports filtering by email, role, active status, email verification, and auth provider.
Get specific account by ID.
Create a new account. Body type: Raw JSON.
Soft delete an account.
Activate an account.
Deactivate an account.
Mark email as verified for an account.
Unmark email verification for an account.
Update last login timestamp for an account.
Update account role. Body type: Raw JSON.
Get account statistics (total, by role, active/inactive counts).
Get count of accounts by specific role.
Get count of active accounts.
Check if an email already exists in the system.
Get all certificates with optional filters for therapist, type, and status.
Get specific certificate by ID.
Approve a therapist's certificate.
Reject a therapist's certificate with reason. Body type: Raw JSON.
Get all therapists with optional search and filter parameters. All filters can be combined in one endpoint.
Get specific therapist by ID.

formdata.value: PhD in Clinical Psychology, Stanford University
Experienced therapist specializing in anxiety and depression treatment

request.description: Create a new therapist. Body type: Form Data (multipart/form-data) for file upload.
Update therapist details. Body type: Form Data. All fields are optional.
Soft delete a therapist.
Permanently delete a therapist.
Restore a soft-deleted therapist.
Update therapist verification status. Body type: Raw JSON.
Update therapist accepting patients status. Body type: Raw JSON.
Check and automatically update verification status based on requirements.
Get therapist statistics (total, verified, accepting patients counts).
Get all patients with pagination.
Get specific patient by ID.

formdata.value: Looking for help with anxiety management

request.description: Create a new patient. Body type: Form Data (multipart/form-data) for file upload.
Update patient details. Body type: Form Data. All fields are optional.
Soft delete a patient.
Restore a soft-deleted patient.
Get patient statistics (total count).
Get all events with optional filters for title, time period, and date range.
Get specific event by ID.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Mental Health Awareness Workshop",
  "description": "Interactive workshop on mental health",
  "event_date": "2025-10-20T14:00:00Z",
  "location": "Online",
  "max_participants": 50
}

request.description: Create a new event. Admin only. Body type: Raw JSON.
Update event details. Admin only. Body type: Raw JSON.
Soft delete an event. Admin only.
Permanently delete an event. Admin only.
Restore a soft-deleted event. Admin only.
Get event statistics. Admin only.
Get all therapist-patient matches with optional filters.
Get specific match by ID.
Get detailed match information with related data.
Get all matches for a specific patient.
Get count of matches for a specific patient.
Get all matches for a specific therapist.
Get count of matches for a specific therapist.
Check if a match exists between patient and therapist.
Create a new therapist-patient match. Admin only. Body type: Raw JSON.
Update match details. Admin only. Body type: Raw JSON.
Update only the match score. Admin only. Body type: Raw JSON.
Soft delete a match. Admin only.
Permanently delete a match. Admin only.
Restore a soft-deleted match. Admin only.
Create multiple matches at once. Admin only. Body type: Raw JSON array.
Get match statistics. Admin only.
Get all chats. Admin only.
Get all active chats. Admin only.
Get specific chat by ID.
Get all messages in a specific chat.
Delete a chat. Admin only.
Activate a chat. Admin only.
Deactivate a chat. Admin only.
Get specific time slot by ID.
Get all time slots for a specific therapist.

item.name: Get Therapist Time Slots by Day

request.description: Get therapist time slots for a specific day (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday).
Check if therapist is available at specific time.

query.description: Filter by active status (true for active template, false for inactive templates)

request.description: Get all questionnaire templates. Use ?is_active=true to get active template only, ?is_active=false for inactive templates.
Get specific questionnaire template by ID.
Create a new questionnaire template. Body type: Raw JSON.
Update questionnaire template. Body type: Raw JSON. All fields are optional.
Soft delete a questionnaire template.
Activate a questionnaire template (deactivates all other templates).
Deactivate a questionnaire template.
Get all appointments with pagination.
Get specific appointment by ID.
Get all appointments for a specific therapist.
Get all appointments for a specific patient.
